text:
Hey E-mentors!
:fallen_leaf: *Welcome to our Autumn pilot programme!* :fallen_leaf:
Everyone will be signing in over the course of the weekend ready to be *introduced to your Mentees on Monday.*
In the meantime, here's *a short intro video* <https://youtu.be/UtLFw4Dbyj4> :film_projector::film_projector: so be sure to check it out.
*Feel free to include a personal picture on your profile too* (we want to see your lovely faces!)
Otherwise, let us know if you have any questions :ok_hand::ok_hand:

attachments.title: E Mentors Welcome - Prospela Autumn Programme
attachments.fallback: YouTube Video: E Mentors Welcome - Prospela Autumn Programme

text: <@U00> pinned a message to this channel.
